messages.messageText: okay... I watch movies, series and makes my own interpretations...

latest : watched <u>anchaam pathira</u> movie and thought the real culprit is someone else. </br> <button type='button' class='btn btn-outline-light btn-sm badge' onclick='callAngularFunction("show the real conversation in ancham pathira movie between Dr benjamin Louis and Anwar Hussain");'> show real conversation</button>
